
Subject: Your dedicated server expires today

Hello %%%FIRST_NAME%%%,

Your dedicated server %%%SERVER_HOSTNAME%%%
has expired today, on the: %%%EXPIRATION_DATE%%%.

Please login into your control panel at

%%%DTC_CLIENT_URL%%%

with your login %%%DTC_ADM_LOGIN%%% click on your server tab, and renew it.

We will keep your server up few days to give you the time to renew your
contract. After the grace period your server will be shutdown.

%%%SIGNATURE%%%
